title: Is the movie Contagion an accurate representation of what would happen if a disease spread that fast and we had no time to prepare? - Quora

response.answer_text: First is just a movie plus there are some many movies out there about virus. Its the race to save human kind. The script must have thrilling events si ut can have box office earning. Back to real life. The COVID 19 is here to stay and the damage on human lives is still counting. There are so many World class scientists trying to develop a vaccine and human lives are suffering, country economy are suffering, big company name near bankrupt. People out of jobs, etc. All these are fact and not movies. Time wait for no.man as the saying goes. Questions we ask ourself, did the government act on time, know what they are suppose to do or have ready trained people ready to meet this form of pandemic? Lot of IFs.

It’s been so long ago since I watched that movie, I just don’t remember. But Hollywood generally works like this. A grain of truth. A boatload of movie going interest. One thing I didn’t understand was why why not work on the disease and chase that monkey down later.
